name: Crunch Time (Radio Sparks)
description:
You took the rule of "don't work too hard" a little too seriously and now its 5 minutes to the deadline and you have no game.

Build the game as you go by collecting pieces of it and get extra points by collecting code snippets along the way.

Controls

W A S D to Move

Space to Jump

Shift to sprint (when unlocked)

If you would like to play without a time limit, press the = key to disable it.

Note
I do not own a mac or linux computer so I am unable to test those versions, sorry if you run into any issues.
